name: Resident Funny: Ghost apartment
description:
A continuing story about our protagonist Bob.

Finding a place to live was easy, it also came with a job!

Bob is a care taker of a old industry that made rare weapons called

Shock guns!  they are effective against ghosts and zombies,

they wouldn't hurt a live person but incapacitate hostile.

with a ghost, it would just send them to the great beyond.

All would go well until ghosts and spirits been showing up and started behaving more hostile to people that worked at the building.

you might want to get out of there. . .
